name: tanstack-ai
description: This skill provides production-ready guidance for TanStack AI (alpha) to build provider-agnostic, type-safe AI chat with streaming, server/client tools, approval flows, and adapters for OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and Ollama. Use it to scaffold new chat APIs, wire React or Solid frontends with `useChat`/`ChatClient`, define isomorphic tools with `toolDefinition().server()` / `.client()`, or debug streaming and agent loop behavior. Use when: connecting TanStack AI to OpenAI/Anthropic/Gemini/Ollama
